title: Development Manager
description: Designed and implemented franchise-wide process improvements in tangent with developing game features for the main game and special builds.
responsibilities: Awarded the Franchise Peer-to-Peer Recognition Award in March 2023.
Led the FC 24 Closed Beta, equipped with a multidisciplinary team of engineers, artists, and producers, increased the total player count by 40% and project scope by 100%.
Ran sprint planning and bug tracking for the main menu navigation redesign for FC 24, through implementing Agile development frameworks

title: PMO Lead
description: Oversaw and engaged in the planning and execution of all services, while driving product, customer, and internal operational excellence
responsibilities: Built and led a delivery team of project managers and technical resources as a hiring and people manager

title: Junior Project Manager
responsibilities: Recognized in February 2021 with the Work Culture Champion award, for driving and promoting a culture of positivity and warmth during a crucial period of growth for the company.
